titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania LJS 386: Kitāb Mīzān al-ḥikmah.

availability.licence: These images and the content of Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts LJS 386: Kitāb Mīzān al-ḥikmah. are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. See the Creative Commons Public Domain Mark page for usage details, http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/.

msIdentifier.repository: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts

msContents.summary: Substantial sections from an illustrated treatise on the measurement of weight, with a historical introduction to theories of gravity and weighing in Greek and Arabic science; tables of densities of substances including metals, precious stones, solids, and liquids; and descriptions of different types of balances. 26 diagrams and 18 tables with a few marginal notes. A few catchwords have been added by later hands. Damage to edges of many leaves.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in naskh in black ink; partially pointed, with headings in larger tawqīʻ.

decoDesc.decoNote: 26 diagrams and 18 tables in red and black ink; rubrications in red.

binding.p: Unbound, with some partial gatherings still joined or repaired at gutter.

origin.p: Item is undated, likely copied sometime between the last half of the 13th century and the first half of the 14th century.

history.provenance: Sold by Sam Fogg Ltd., cat. 22 (2000), to Lawrence J. Schoenberg.
Deposit by Lawrence J. Schoenberg and Barbara Brizdle, 2011.
